etymologies: late Middle English: variant of ho

definitions: used to express surprise, interest, or alarm, or to command attention
shortDefinitions: used to express surprise, interest, or alarm

definitions: used as a command to a horse to make it stop or slow down, or to urge a person to stop or wait

examples.text: whoa, hold on a minute, Fred!

shortDefinitions: used as command to horse to make it stop or slow down
